cluster: Reason about and solve one-variable equations and inequalities.
description: Write an inequality of the form  >  or  <  to represent a constraint or condition in a real-world or mathematical problem. Recognize that inequalities of the form  >  or < c have infinitely many solutions; represent solutions of such inequalities on number line diagrams.
